name: Comics
0:
”Alexa, ask Comic Information to tell me about Spiderman”
”Alexa, ask Comic Information to tell me about a random character”
”Alexa, ask Comic Information to talk about Batman”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: comic information
des:
This skill gets information about comic characters currently, but it will have functionality to search by comic issues, series and other data later on.

This uses the amazing Comicvine API (https://comicvine.gamespot.com) ^o^

Feedback is appreciated, and I'm open to feature requests
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
